original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields end steady, rupee at 313.00/30 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields ends steady on Thursday and the rupee closed at 313.00/30 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 28.40/60 percent, steady from 28.60/90 percent at yesterday’s close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 30.10/70 percent on Thursday, also steady from 30.50/75 percent at yesterday’s close.
The rupee closed at 313.00/30 against the US dollar in the spot market appreciated from the last close at 317.50/318.50. (Colombo/May11/2023)
